Overview: During CS 6440, students will explore health information technology through working with lab assignments and a practicum project designed to provide a hands-on experience with state-of-the-art health informatics tools and systems. Topics include health terminologies, HL7 FHIR, SMARTonFHIR, the OMOP Common Data Model, OHDSI Atlas, and more!. They will apply the knowledge and skills they learn to work individually or with a team of their classmates on a real-world clinical challenge.
